oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oral history interview with Houston and Ella Overton
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Claiming Space
Towns, Neighborhoods
African American neighborhoods; African Americans; African American women; African American schools
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Overtons discuss growing up in separate African American communities in Murfreesboro, meeting one another at Holloway High School in 1941, and attending First Baptist Church.
